reuters.title: BRADLEY <BRLY> ANNOUNCES LONG-TERM LEASE
reuters.body: Bradley Real Estate Trust said it signed a 99-year lease for property in downtown Minneapolis to BCED Minnesota Inc. The lease will increase net income by about 24 cts a share on a post-February 1987 three-for-two stock split basis. For 1986, the Trust reported net income of 1.3 mln dlrs or 38 cts a share on a post-split basis. Bradley will also be entitled to a one-time additional rental payment of 30 cts a share upon BCED entering into a space lease with a prime national tenant and a share in a portion of net cash flow from operations on the property.
